articles.title: Americans pan some of Trump’s biggest foreign policy moves in new poll - Politico
articles.description: Data released shows skepticism about foreign policy and tariff strategy.
articles.content: It also found that just over half of Americans believe that the presidents tariffs on China will be bad for the country, a question that was asked before this weeks huge selloff in the financial mark… [+712 chars]
